content:
Verse 1:
It started in the clubs of Chicago
With a beat that made you wanna go go
From disco to the new wave sound
House music was taking over the town

Chorus:
House music, house music
The beat of the streets
House music, house music
The rhythm can't be beat

Verse 2:
It spread to the streets of New York City
With DJs spinning records in the city
The sound was evolving every day
From garage to deep, house music had its way

Chorus:
House music, house music
The beat of the streets
House music, house music
The rhythm can't be beat

Bridge:
The Roland TB-303 gave birth to acid
And techno and trance took it to the limit
From the underground to the mainstream
House music was living its dream

Chorus:
House music, house music
The beat of the streets
House music, house music
The rhythm can't be beat

Outro:
From the past to the present
House music's here to stay
With a beat that never ends
It will always light the way

House music, house music
The beat of the streets
House music, house music
The rhythm can't be beat.
